Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 17 Maggārammaṇattika » 17.1 Paṭiccavāra » 17.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 17.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Maggārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
7.
2448Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sattarasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2449Anulomaṃ.
